body.name: ROVSUN 1.32cu.ft Portable Washing Machine with Drain Pump, 13LBS Full-Automatic Washer, 10 Programs 8 Water Levels, Perfect for Household Use
features: 【Easy to Operate】Designed with a fully automatic programmed, and all functions and operations are clearly listed on the control panel, once you set the corresponding washing program, you could just leave it alone to work and do your own things during the laundry. Convenient for people even for the elder and child to operate

【Large Wash and Spin Capacity】This electric clothes washer is constructed with spacious capacity and powerful motor washes up to 13lbs of laundry to sooner wash your clothes, sheets and dedicates, almost meets the washing needs of the whole family

【Full-Automatic Smart Washer】Relieve yourself from manual washing with our portable laundry washing machine. Automatically start washing, rinsing, and spinning cycles to clean and dry clothes after setting the mode according to the amount and material of clothes we put in it, which makes our life easier

【Built-in Drain Pump】Equipped with a drain pump and an extended drainage hose drains out dirty water effortlessly. You can choose drain water to a higher position or a convenient place randomly. Comes with inlet hose and a clamp, this clamp can help you fit the faucet tightly, avoid hose falling off

【Designed for Mobility】There is no installation need and easy to operate. This portable clothes washer machine can easily be transported from room to room, and it only needs a small space for store. Ideal choice for apartments, dorms, RVs, bathroom or any other places
body.description: Features: Mini portable washing machine, small space neededFeatures a compact 13lbs load capacity for doing light to medium laundry loadsFull automatic washing machine, release your hand from washingStainless steel inner tub2 water pipes included（inlet pipe & drain pipe）10 programs & 8 water-level selections with LED display

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Package Includes: 1 x 13lbs Full Automatic Washing Machine1 x Manual Book1 x Drain Pipe1 x Inlet Pipe Features: Mini portable washing machine, small space neededFeatures a compact 13lbs load capacity for doing light to medium laundry loadsFull automatic washing machine, release your hand from washingStainless steel inner tub2 water pipes included（inlet pipe & drain pipe）10 programs & 8 water-level selections with LED display

Easy Operation The operation panel, adjustable washing mode and water level can meet everyone's needs. You just need to put in your clothes, choose the way you want to wash and start washing, it fits anywhere! Powerful Motor Washing and spinning are all work by 1350RPM quality motor, with a max frequency of 60Hz. It can provide high strength and high dehydration efficiency, powerful, fast, and work longer, what's more, it will make your clothes more cleaner! Excellent Quality The inner tube of the washing machine is made of stainless steel, it has a longer service life than plastic,and the smooth surface of the stainless steel, the stains produced during the washing process will not be adsorbed on the surface. 360°Rotation The 360° rotating design more efficiently washes your clothes and shortens the drying time. It is an essential assistant for your home and travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2020
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great buy for me!!!! Came two weeks sooner than expected. A bit heavy to pick up but not too bad. Large enough to wash any type of clothing. The only thing that would make this machine perfect to me is if I didn't have to constantly empty the hose to grown level. And I wish it had a slightly larger capacity for duvets. Other than that.. This totally exceeded my expectations and washes, soaks,rinses and spins. I didn't really trust the hose that came with the machine because it seemed like a pretty flimsy plastic that would become damaged with use overtime. I replaced it with a stronger plastic/ rubbery hose with a saddle included. And I used two clamps at the bottom (beginning)of the drain hose. The clothes are a bit damp after taking them out from spinning if they're bulky. But it doesn't take clothes too long to air dry. I just downsized to a 1 story coming from a 2 story house. I needed a washer and this doesn't take up much space at all. I wanted a huge bang for.mu buck. Right under 200$ and it has a nice capacity!?! Great quality!!!! What a deal!!! And that's just what I got! Great customer service! I'm a happy camper 🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product is great
reviews.reviewText: This product is great, it's a saver for me. It is quick real quality.It even it makes the clothing dry quicker. Very easy to use.I would recommend this product to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value and quality for the price!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. After purchasing and returning another portable washer I decided to give this one a try. I am very impressed with the quality and performance so far. I believe it can't be beat on quality and performance for this low price compared to other models sold here. I hope it lasts me for a long time.Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It's NOT FULLY AUTOMATIC THAT US A LIE. it doesn't automatically drain the water. You have to have it elevated. I learned the hard way. I bought this SO CALLED FULLY automatic washer and the company gave me the RUN AROUND. They seriously offered me an $8 refund. They are a Joke! I finally got a return label in which I have to pay shipping 🙄 let's see how much that is. I'll give an update later

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best buy ever
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This machine is worth the buy! I watched one of the reviews for this where someone was draining the water in a bucket. No need for that. This machine has a pump that drains the water right out of the machine. Just make sure the hose is secure somehow in your sink when draining so the hose doesn't fly around due to the pressure of the water drainage flow when draining. In this video is my cleaning rags washing away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great Washer. Don't let the size fool you, I can easily wash my quilt or comforter on my beds when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: When purchasing this machine, there is a good chance that the instruction manual will be with the machine, it took much effort to hook the machine up, the inlet hose it came with fit absolutely nothing so after many tries of running to different stores, in order to work with the water inlet hose. I ended up having to buy a regular washer hose and two types of attachment, one for the faucet that eventually didn't work as planned then I went and attached it to the shower head and Viola' success. The machine has been thoroughly tested and my final take away.1. The washer needs a regular washer hose inlet and possibly two adapters, shop online for a long washer inlet for good reach.2. Washer works well but it is not the greatest in removing water completely on spin cycle, your clothes will retain a fair amount of water.3. washing machine does a decent job of washing, the display is fairly decent to work with considering we didn't get directions.4. The delivery was good, no external damage from what I can see.Is it worth the money, for the effort. In my case yes once I was able to take the time to talk to the right people at the home improvement store, the machine works well despite having any a few obstacles in my way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It will save you time and money
reviews.reviewText: Best washer I had perfect for apartment and saves me time from going to the laundry mat or go wash at my parents house only thing is the hose that comes with it its to short I had to make a custom long enough to make it work properly also the water pump is not strong enough to pump it upwards like a normal one it has to be in a flat surface in order for the water to come out when spinning
